designer.manufacturer_story: Pearl is gifted with colors and fashion arts, and was greatly curious and craving for fashion design since her childhood. Nurtured by her parents in the aspect of art, Pearl was greatly interested in reading fashion magazines from different European countries, and from which a lot of her inspirations were gained. Through years of efforts and with her parents’ support, she finally founded her own studio and her label “QinPei.er”.Her label is featured with fresh colors, fashionable cuts, retro elements and unique floral prints. She advocates using unique designs to cultivate label concept. In her perspective, only when garments are appropriately dressed, the label’s glamor can be embodied.
designer.manufacturer_des: Designer Pearl is talented in using different colors and cuts to highlight the uniqueness of fabrics.
designer.name: QinPei.er
designer.manufacturer_mood: Using different colors and cuts to highlight the uniqueness of fabrics.

designer.manufacturer_story: As a young ballet dancer, Cici was always curious in the world of arts, and would like to find different ways to express and share her vision of arts. In childhood, she loves to try on her mom’s clothes and high heels. Since young, her fashion senses were heavily influenced by her mother’s style of dress, mysterious female elegant, feminine and romantic. When she grows up and enters into the fashion industry, her style is focused on simple and elegant design to highlight feminine beauty and romantic. Her clothing line is perfect fit for either normal business attire or formal occasions.
designer.manufacturer_des: Cici Lau, her eclectic aesthetic is translated in her style by highlighting feminine beauty with simple, elegant, and romantic design.
designer.name: Friday
designer.manufacturer_mood: Eclectic aesthetic translated with simple, elegant, and romantic design.

list.story: Cut from high end silk-satin, and decorated with floral pattern embroidery of Chinese elements. Hip package design made this black dress more fashionable and charming. Style it with black high heels and an evening clutch.
list.name: Embroidery Silk-satin Mini dress

designer.manufacturer_story: Being heavily influenced by her artistic parents, Miss Li was always interested in fine arts and talented in drawing. When she was a child, her parents would love to dress her up in variety of styles, which nurtured her unique aesthetic perspectives. After graduating from college, she was determined to become a fashion designer. Soon after join the garment industry, she created her own brand “PLEATS SERIES”. She believes that, each item is weaved not only as a simple garment, but also to express itself and the creator’s desires and essences. Especially fond of pleats design, she bestows pleats process with beauty, and each of her items shows an artistic and layered aesthetics. She has weaved her garment view and life philosophy into her label, through which to express her fashion attitude to the public.
designer.manufacturer_des: Miss Li's eclectic aesthetic perspective is best translated in her unique pleats design. Her design bestows pleats process with beauty, and each of her items shows an artistic and layered aesthetics.
designer.name: Pleats Series
designer.manufacturer_mood: Eclectic aesthetic perspective translated with artistic and layered pleats.

list.story: This black dress is featured with its pleats design, in unique and fashionable cut representing your glamor. Woven fabric and embellishment stretch process raises its quality-price ratio. Style it with black high heel sandals to be understated.
list.name: Pleated Plain Midi Dress

list.story: This dress is crafted from woven fabrics, and with multiple color panels, full of stylish craftsmanship. Drapes cut demonstrates the brand’s uniqueness, and H shape hem flatters your curvy figure. Style it with light color high heel sandals.
list.name: Color-block pleated Woven Knee Length dress

list.story: This long coat is crafted from crepe fabric, and with color blocking to create a fashionable taste. Fall pleats jersey perfectly demonstrates the texture and detail, and the fall pattern makes it elegant and stylish. Style it with skinny pants.
list.name: Draped jersey Crepe Long Coat

list.story: This green short coat is crafted from crepe fabric, and with fall pleats jersey textile to represent its quality and craftsmanship. Slightly loose cut creates a stylish image. We like it styled with dark long pants.
list.name: Draped jersey Crepe Short Sleeved top

list.story: This light and thin short coat is crafted from crepe fabric. Long sleeved pattern is suitable in summer. Fall pleats jersey process reveals its textile quality and sense of touching. Drapes make it fashionable. Style it with black high heels.
list.name: Draped jersey Crepe short coat

designer.manufacturer_story: The designer Yuki is a pretty and confident girl. She likes to travel alone in different countries, find beauties and experience local customs. She always dreamed about fashion, and integrate the art and culture she has learned during traveling into her fashion designs and help more women to grasp the latest trend and cultivate dressing styles of their own. She founded her own company and label YuJia, insisting the concept of “fashionable & high end”. Through years of efforts and innovations, their garments became popular in Europe, North America and Korea, etc. Fashion elements such as embroidery, cut out, digital print, and pleat, etc. are used in her creations. She believes that what fashion represents is not merely fashion, but also craftsmanship.
designer.manufacturer_des: Designer Yuki is a pretty and confident girl, and her designs are featured in high quality and fashion by using elements like embroidery, cut out, digital floral prints, and pleats, etc.
designer.name: YuJia
designer.manufacturer_mood: Featured in using embroidery, cut out, digital floral prints, and pleats...

designer.manufacturer_story: As an artistic girl, Lancy was fond of fashion illustration skills, crushing on fashion industry and full of expectation about it. She was interested in reading different countries’ fashion magazines, and absorbing the dress codes into her design styles. For turning her interest into career, she founded the fashion label “LONYUASH”, which is full of artistic and fashionable elements, such as stripes, floral prints, plaids, and polka dots, etc. Her designs are unique and romantic. In Lancy’s perspective, a woman who really knows to dress will not pursue any brand but the quality, and a brand always needs careful cultivation to represent its features.
designer.manufacturer_des: This label is founded by Lancy. She keeps designing in various styles and patterns, as well as raising the fabric level.
designer.name: LONYUASH
designer.manufacturer_mood: Expressing the label by various styles, patters and high quality fabrics.
